designSystemProfile.name: Frosted Glass UI
designSystemProfile.description: A design system profile based on a modern, clean interface with a 'glassmorphism' aesthetic. It is characterized by blurred, semi-transparent backgrounds, soft shadows, rounded shapes, and generous spacing to create an airy and focused user experience.

overallBackground.suggestion: Use a light, out-of-focus image like clouds, or a soft multi-tone gradient (e.g., light blue to a slightly different light blue). The background should provide texture without distracting from the main content container.

primaryContainer.description: Semi-transparent white for primary containers, intended for use with a background blur effect to create the 'frosted glass' look.

accent.description: A strong, near-black color for primary calls-to-action and elements requiring high emphasis.

textPrimary.description: Very dark gray for primary headings and important text.

textSecondary.description: A medium gray for subheadings, body text, and input field placeholders.

textTertiary.description: A lighter gray for less important text like helper text, small links, and separators.

surface.description: A very light, slightly off-white gray for input field backgrounds and other interactive surfaces.

border.description: A subtle, light, and semi-transparent border to define the edges of glass containers.

buttonText.description: White text for use on dark, high-contrast backgrounds like the primary accent color.

fontFamily.description: A clean, geometric sans-serif font is essential for the modern aesthetic.

heading1.description: For the main title or heading of a view.

label.description: For text within input fields and placeholders.

caption.description: For small helper text, links, and text within separators.

shadow.name: Soft Drop Shadow
shadow.description: A soft, diffused shadow to create depth and lift containers off the background.

blur.name: Frosted Glass Blur
blur.description: Applied to semi-transparent backgrounds to create the core glassmorphism effect.

pageLayout.description: The main content container is horizontally and vertically centered within the viewport.

container.name: Primary Card
container.description: A single, central container houses the main interactive elements. It follows a vertical flow.

iconContainer.description: A small, decorative container for a primary icon, placed at the top of the card.

social.description: Clickable brand icons for social logins, presented without a visible button container to maintain a clean look.

separator.description: A horizontal rule with text in the center to separate content sections, typically between primary and secondary actions.
